attributes.contentHtml: So we have seen plexed's filth and all he has done with all of his customer data he has lost over the months, he has lost over thousands of customer data adn went to abuse big corporations, now im not saying im bad, but im my opinion i dont think i went as far as him, i was very new to hosting when i was abusing, and i of course had no source of income, but this thread isnt about me it is about the scum Plexed/Badsk himself. (Side Note: Ik this thread is a bit useless but this i just a discussion after all.)

attributes.title: Will plexed/badsk be able to repay?
